title.rendered: Search Berg Wishes You A Happy Thanksgiving!

content.rendered:
As the year comes to an end and the holiday spirit engulfs us, we’re all a little bit grateful than we’ve ever been before—for our loved ones, our health, and the simple pleasures of life—and it feels good to focus on that this time of the year.

Search Berg extends its warmest wishes and gratitude to all the clients who trusted us with their businesses, our partners for their unrelenting support, our affiliates, and our super-skilled team at Search Berg who helped us push past the boundaries of greatness.

Here’s what we’re SEO grateful for:

  • 30,000+ SEO projects completed
  • 150,000+ content pieces published
  • 22,800+ infographics and videos created
  • Winning the Clutch Award for Top Small Business SEO Company In 2020
  • Winning the Clutch Award for Top WordPress Developers of 2020
  • Thousands of satisfied clients!

We can’t wait to see what 2021 holds for us—because if 2020 has taught us anything, it’s that we’re always going to weather the storm, no matter how dark and bleak it is!

We thank you for your support and are looking forward to our continued ground-breaking collaborations for years to come!

May we open up a world full of new possibilities together.

Have a fantastic Turkey day!
